page.title: 02Christow Primary School
page.content:
Christow School celebrated its centenary in 1980 although a school existed before 1880 on another site in the village.
The first headteacher was Miss White who was the head for 40 years. After Miss White there have only been 6 other headteachers they are: Mr Stacey, Mr Parsons, Mr Alderdice and Mr Rigby. All were heads for several years except Mr Rigby - he found it necessary to resign owing to ill health in May 1985 after only 4 years. Our new headteacher from September is Mr Graham.
